name: AEGRĒ
description:
That small blue...umm... thing might look cute, but it can be really annoying. 
So what do you need do? He doesn't know either.
But try the hurdle the obstacles that fall before you with the use of different skills which you can combine.

Prepare to die... a lot, but hey faliure is a part of life, so its okay.
